Tag filters


Classes

struct  TMR_TagFilter
struct  TMR_GEN2_Select
struct  TMR_ISO180006B_Select
struct  TMR_TagData

Detailed Description

Tag filters cause the reader to limit an inventory to a subset of tags (in a TMR_ReadPlan) or a tag operation to an individual tag (as a parameter to a tag operation function).
